00027 void TOctalFADCBankReader::ProcessEvent(EVENT_HEADER* pheader, void *pevent)
00028 {
00029   ClearEvent();
00030 
00031   unsigned char* raw; // Points at the raw data, one byte at a time.
00032   int bankSize = bk_locate(pevent,fBankName.c_str(),&raw);
00033   int nSamples = bankSize / kDataBlockSize;
00034 
00035   vector<int> islandSamples;
00036   islandSamples.reserve(kSamplesArrayInitialSize);
00037 
00038   bool allowLowSampls = 1;
00039   int islandTimestamp = 0; // time of first 4-sample block in stitched island
00040   int lastTimestamp = -1; // To see the end of the last island.
00041   for(int i=0; i < nSamples; i++){
00042     // data format:
00043     //
00044     // bits
00045     // 79 FADC 0 / 1
00046     // 78-52 timestamp
00047     // 51-48 overflow
00048     // 47-36 sampleB0
00049     // 35-24 sampleA0
00050     // 23-12 sampleB1
00051     // 11-0 sampleA1
00052     //
00053     // Island samples in the order A1 B1 A0 B0
00054 
00055     int timestamp = ((raw[i*10+0] & 0x7f) << 20) |
00056                      (raw[i*10+1] << 12) |
00057                      (raw[i*10+2] << 4) |
00058                      (raw[i*10+3] >> 4);
00059     bool overflowB0 = ((raw[i*10+3] & 0x08) != 0);
00060     bool overflowA0 = ((raw[i*10+3] & 0x04) != 0);
00061     bool overflowB1 = ((raw[i*10+3] & 0x02) != 0);
00062     bool overflowA1 = ((raw[i*10+3] & 0x01) != 0);
00063     int sampleB0 = (overflowB0 << 12) |
00064                    (raw[i*10+4] << 4) |
00065                    (raw[i*10+5] >> 4);
00066     int sampleA0 = (overflowA0 << 12) |
00067                    ((raw[i*10+5] & 0xf) << 8) |
00068                    (raw[i*10+6]);
00069     int sampleB1 = (overflowB1 << 12) |
00070                    (raw[i*10+7] << 4) |
00071                    (raw[i*10+8] >> 4);
00072     int sampleA1 = (overflowA1 << 12) |
00073                    ((raw[i*10+8] & 0xf) << 8) |
00074                    (raw[i*10+9]);
00075 
00076     if(timestamp != lastTimestamp + 1) {
00077       if(islandSamples.size() > 4) {
00078           // This is a new island, so put the old
00079           // island on fData and start again.
00080           // Remember, time stamps are actually 4 samples long.
00081           fData.push_back(
00082             new TOctalFADCIsland(islandTimestamp*4,islandSamples)
00083           );
00084           islandSamples.clear();
00085       }
00086       else if (islandSamples.size() <= 4) {
00087         islandSamples.clear();
00088       }
00089       // Ignore islands with 4 or less samples.
00090       islandTimestamp = timestamp;
00091     }
00092 
00093     islandSamples.push_back(sampleA1);
00094     islandSamples.push_back(sampleB1);
00095     islandSamples.push_back(sampleA0);
00096     islandSamples.push_back(sampleB0);
00097 
00098     lastTimestamp = timestamp;
00099 
00100     //last pulse in the block!
00101     if ((i==nSamples-1) && (islandSamples.size() > 4)){
00102       fData.push_back(
00103         new TOctalFADCIsland(islandTimestamp*4,islandSamples)
00104       );
00105     }
00106 
00107 #if 0
00108 for(int k=0; k<10; k++){
00109 printf("%x ",raw[i*10 + k]);
00110 }
00111 printf("\n");
00112 printf("fadc=%x t=%2x %2x %2x %2x %2x\n", i, timestamp,
00113 sampleA1, sampleB1, sampleA0,sampleB0);
00114 #endif
00115 
00116   }
00117 
00118   if(fData.size()>1)
00119   {
00120     //Time sort islands
00121     std::sort(fData.begin(), fData.end(),TOctalFADCIsland::TimeSortFADCIslands());
00122     StitchIslands();
00123   } // Some Pulses are split over two separate islands. Put them together again
00124  // printf(".............. FADC islands sorted .............\n");
00125 }
00126 
00127 void TOctalFADCBankReader::StitchIslands()
00128 {
00129 
00130   vector<TOctalFADCIsland*> fData_temp;
00131   //fData_temp.clear();
00132   
00133   TOctalFADCIsland* last = fData.at(0);
00134   //if(fData.size()>1){printf("Size first Island: %d\n",fData.at(1).GetNSamples());}
00135   fData_temp.push_back(last);
00136   int counter_temp = 0; int counter = 0;
00137   
00138   for(unsigned int i = 1; i<fData.size(); i++)
00139   {
00140     if(fData.at(i)->GetTime() - (last->GetTime() + last->GetNSamples()) >2 )
00141     {
00142       last = fData.at(i);
00143       fData_temp.push_back(last);
00144       counter_temp++;
00145     }
00146     else
00147     {
00148       vector<int>& samples = fData_temp.at(counter_temp)->GetSampleVector();
00149 
00150       for(int j=0;j<fData.at(i)->GetNSamples();j++)
00151       {
00152         samples.push_back(fData.at(i)->GetSampleVector().at(j));
00153       }
00154       counter++;
00155       last = fData_temp.at(counter_temp);
00156     }
00157   }
00158 
00159   //printf("Size original: %d, size stitched: %d, counter %d\n",fData.size(),fData_temp.size(),counter);
00160 
00161   fData.clear();
00162   fData = fData_temp;
00163   fData_temp.clear();
00164 
00165   //printf("Size new: %d, size temp: %d, counter %d , counter_temp %d\n",fData.size(),fData_temp.size(),counter,counter_temp);
00166 
00167 }
00168 
00169 void TOctalFADCBankReader::ClearEvent()
00170 {
00171   for(int i=0; i<fData.size(); i++) {
00172     if(fData[i]) { delete fData[i]; fData[i] = NULL; }
00173   }
00174   fData.clear();
00175 }
